title: [Medicine] Gene-editing using CRISPR have the potential to permanently modify disease-causing genes. Scientists demonstrate that CRISPR base editors delivered using lipid nanoparticles can modify disease-related genes in living monkeys to lower cholesterol by ~60% after a single-dose treatment.

[Health] Different physical activity 'cocktails' have similar health benefits. People who spent just a few minutes engaging in moderate-to-vigorous physical activity lowered their risk of early death by 30% as long as they also spent six hours engaging in light physical activity.
